channel.title: Need Development Team! Grim's Hallow| Where Gods Are Born!
channel.description:
[b][size=10pt]Hello Moparians :) Im Deathdomain, Im currently remaking my server from the grown up using the same Source Rune-Evo (Credit for base goes to Fox2007 (aka king fox)) its a Matrix 718 Loading 742 cache and i would love to get a team going to start this up again :)
You Have A Input On New Changes and Things You Would Like To See!!!!!
Features:l
Friendly Staff and Owner's
[u]Staff Positions Available[/u]
GWD [img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/32/70/106037032/photos/While-in-Grims-Hallow/God_Wars_pic.png[/img]
Nex
Friendly staff!! -Need staff still but need development team first!
Jadinko Dungeon!!
Ganodermic Beasts
Custom Home!! (making a new area soon for it)
Qbd!! [img]http://memberfiles.freewebs.com/32/70/106037032/photos/While-in-Grims-Hallow/Qbd.png[/img]
Kbd!!
Donaterzone!!
Tormented Demons!!
Corp!!
Glacors!!
Avatar of Destruction!!
wildywyrms!!
Clan wars!!
Duel Arena!!
Castle Wars!
Barrows!!
fight pits!!
Dominion Tower!!
Zombies!!
Fully working Fight Caves (All 63 waves)
Fully working Fight Kiln
Full Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes
Unique custom made home
Fully automated DoubleXP Weekends
Crucible also fully working!
All GodWars bosses!
Full QBD and KBD
All Aura's Working with Wings and stuff
I really would love some people to help out!
PM for my skype if i dont reply back quick on here as i should unless im trying to fix things!
Thanks and Have a Great day :)[/size][/b]

item.title: Need Development Team! Grim's Hallow| Where Gods Are Born!
item.dc:creator: @Deathdomain Deathdomain
item.description:
@Deathdomain wrote:

Bumping it to Bumps it

Still looking for a Development Team to help improve the server and make it more unique.

Read full topic
